verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In the morning when I rise,
In the morning when I rise,
In the morning when I rise
Give me Jesus

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Chorus
Give me Jesus
Give me Jesus
You can have all this world,
but give me Jesus

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And when I am alone,
And when I am alone,
And when I am alone
Give me Jesus

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And if I come to die,
And if I come to die,
And if I come to die
Give me Jesus
